name: Benevity
tag_list: microdonation, embedded-giving, corporate-philanthropy, employee-giving, workplace-giving, cause-marketing, corporate-citizenship, corporate-social-responsibility, csr, social-responsibility
overview:
Benevity’s microdonation software enables companies to embed charitable giving into their existing sites, using their own brands and systems.

Benevityâ€™s Web services software enables businesses, financial services providers, corporate employers and other organizations to incorporate a micropayment platform seamlessly into their existing online operations that makes it easy for users to add a small donation to a cause of their choosing as an integrated part of whatever transaction they are conducting.

The Benevity platform can be used to create a wide array of charitable giving opportunities and corporate matching programs into existing business transactions, such as online purchases, account and online banking interfaces, loyalty programs, gift cards, social media applications and employee giving.
